text.textblock: Part of A-154 described as follows: Beginning at the Northeast corner of said A-154; Thence, S. 03
E., 1050 feet, along the East line of said A-154; Thence, N. 82
W., 1500 feet, along the West line of said A-154; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 3500 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the West line of said A-154 at a point which lies N. 01
W., 8050 feet from the Southwest corner of said A-154; Thence, N. 01
W., 300 feet, along the West line of said A-154; Thence, Southerly, approximately 350 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-203 described as follows: Beginning at the Southwest corner of said A-203; Thence, N. 03
W., 2500 feet, along the West line of said A-203; Thence, N. 85
E., 4400 feet, along the East line of said A-203; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 4500 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-433 described as follows: Beginning at the Northwest corner of said A-433; Thence, Easterly, approximately 1500 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 01
E., 300 feet; Thence, Southerly, approximately 500 feet along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 01
E., 1500 feet, along the East line of said A-433; Thence, N. 59
W., 1250 feet, along the West line of said A-433, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-565 described as follows: Beginning at the Northeast corner of said A-565; Thence, S. 01
W., 800 feet, along the West line of said A-565; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 5500 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
